duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross-functional new product development teams from concept to production release in the Analog Power and Interface Business Unit.
Define, track, and coordinate new product requirements and deliverables to achieve successful product launch.
Identify and manage project risks and issues, seeking solutions to improve quality and pull-in schedule.
Effectively communicate with a worldwide team of new product development stakeholders.
Support business unit R&D and Operations teams to ensure devices are manufacturable and are set up correctly in the production system per quality system requirements.
Lead root cause analysis problem-solving efforts and participate in new product post-mortems.
Continuously improve existing systems to reduce new product development/introduction total cycle times and improve product quality.

education_certification.credential: BSEE or MSEE (Preferred) with at least 4-5 years of experience developing semiconductor integrated circuits
